portfolio.description: Sultan Iskandar Muda Absensi (SIMat) is an attendance management system and application used to track the time and attendance of employees and teachers at Sultan Iskandar Muda School (SIM). SIM uses this system to document its employees' work hours and vacation time. With this system, SIMAt helps SIM's human resources department save time and effort in calculating employee work hours.
